rooms.description: Entrance area with reception and storage. Features a small foyer that aligns with Vastu guidelines for auspicious entry.
Spacious Scandinavian-themed living room with large windows ensuring abundant natural light, following Vastu principles of balance and open space.
Modern kitchen designed in a Scandinavian style. Incorporates functional design elements and adheres to local building norms for efficient workflow.
Dining room adjacent to the living area; minimalist design with ample lighting.
Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor. Designed for easy access and efficient use of space.
